item.title: No road /gully/pavement cleaning by Council, 14th February
item.description:
I live at 3 Thornton Way and despite a huge amount of leaf and branch drop over the past four/five months there has been no Barnet Council clearing of leaf build up or small branches that litter the pavement. This is very evident in the south side section between Southway & Meadway. There is a build up of debris in the drains and branch drop is causing obstruction on the pavements.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thornton Way, Hampstead Garden Suburb, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
